titlealts.searchtitle: Supporting Information: Supporting Information Help - Description

entry.p: Supporting Information provides additional information to help users understand and use the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

Each Supporting Information name is distinguished from Classes, Attributes and Data Elements by appearing in Title Case rather than UPPERCASE (see the example below) and where the name appears in text in Blue, it indicates that it is a hyperlink and if clicked on will display the definition for that Supporting Information.
An example of Supporting Information is Organisation Data Service Default Codes.
